author: esammer
msg: - Added NodeManager method for getting a node by name. - No longer return a copy of nodes from AbstractNodeManager#getNodes().

author: esammer
msg: - Added a command processor exec service in which to process async commands in the node manager. - Use guava ThreadPoolBuilder to name thread pools for debugging.

author: esammer
msg: - Updated thread name of channel driver to be easier to read / debug.

author: esammer
msg: - Adjusted logging levels of source / sink factories.

author: esammer
msg: - No longer need NodeManager impls to handle conf-specific mediums.
